directions.dialogText: Each gate has a magic word on it. Say the words in the right order to open all the gates. Don't forget to use \` () \`!!!

levels.mission: When the wizard says a word, all gates with that word will open or close. Have the wizard say the magic words in the right order to get all the gates open.
levels.tools: You can call any function that appears on a gate- like \`foo()\`, \`goo()\`, etc- but make sure to add parentheses \`()\` and a semicolon \`;\`.
levels.tips: Try one gate at a time. Type the function in the code panel and press the step forward button. Then add another line of code and test it in the same way.
